thread.title: Series preview: Cubs at Brewers
thread.title_full: Series preview: Cubs at Brewers - Chicago Tribune

author: chicagotribune.com
title: Series preview: Cubs at Brewers
text:
Games Friday and Saturday on WBBM-AM 780, Sunday's game on WBBM-FM 105.9.
Season series: Cubs 11-5.
Friday: 7:10 p.m., CSN.
RH Jake Arrieta (21-6, 1.92) vs. RH Ariel Pena (2-0, 3.91).
Saturday: 6:10 p.m., CSN.
RH Kyle Hendricks (7-7, 4.09) vs. RH Tyler Wagner (0-1, 11.74).
Sunday: 2:10 p.m., WGN-9.
RH Dan Haren (10-9, 3.67) vs. RH Jorge Lopez (1-0, 5.40).
Who's hot: Arrieta is 15-1 with an 0.89 ERA in his last 19 starts. Catcher Miguel Montero is batting .319 in his last 21 games. Scooter Gennett is 7-for-18 (.389). Khris Davis is 5-for-11 (.455) with two home runs.
Who's not: Jorge Soler is 5-for-23 since returning from the disabled list. Chris Coghlan is 0-for-16. Adam Lind is 2-for-16. Jean Segura is 3-for-16.
Privacy Policy Chicago Cubs Jake Arrieta Jean Segura Adam Lind Chris Coghlan Kyle Hendricks Ariel Pena
